title: Find Mol
content:
she will become an ally in Gather Your Allies. (Fetcher's Favour: Affected entities can cast Rays of Fire, reduce all Fire damage by 5 and gain additional 1d4 to Charisma checks and Saving Throws.)

How to unlock Find Mol

Talk to the Tiefling kids after the ambush in Last Light Inn.

Find Mol Rewards

Mol as Ally in Gather Your Allies

Find Mol Notes & Tips

Notes & tips go here

All Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for H
